items.title: Family-Style Lasagna Bundle (Serves 4-6)
items.description: Bring home our Family-Style Lasagna Bundle for dinner tonight, serving 4-6 people. Your bundle features Lasagna Classico**, our Famous House Salad, and a dozen breadsticks. **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage.

items.title: Large Family-Style Lasagna Bundle (Serves up to 12)
items.description: Bring home our Family-Style Lasagna Bundle for dinner tonight, serving up to 12 people. Your bundle features Lasagna Classico**, 2 of our Jumbo Famous House Salads, and 2 dozen breadsticks. **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage.

items.title: Our Famous Jumbo House Salad includes 12 Breadsticks (Serves 6)
items.description: Our famous jumbo house salad is topped with olives, onions, pepperoncini and tomatoes. Includes our signature salad dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese. Includes a dozen breadsticks.

items.title: Chicken Alfredo (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of sliced grilled chicken and fettuccine pasta with our signature homemade alfredo sauce.

items.title: Chicken Parmigiana (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Incudes: A pan of Chicken Parmigiana and Spaghetti with our homemade marinara.

items.title: Fettuccine Alfredo (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of fettuccine with our homemade alfredo sauce.

items.title: Shrimp Alfredo (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of fettuccine with our homemade alfredo sauce and sautéed shrimp.

items.title: Five Cheese Ziti al Forno (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of ziti pasta in a five cheese marinara sauce, baked with a layer of melted Italian cheeses.

items.title: Spaghetti with Meat Sauce** (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of spaghetti with our traditional homemade meat sauce*. **Our meat sauces are made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage.

items.title: Spaghetti with Marinara Sauce (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of spaghetti with our traditional homemade marinara sauce.

items.title: Chicken Tortelloni Alfredo (serves 4 - 6 )
items.description: Asiago cheese-filled tortelloni baked in our creamy homemade alfredo with a blend of Italian cheeses and toasted breadcrumbs, topped with grilled chicken.

items.title: Lasagna Classico (Serves up to 6)
items.description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce and mozzarella, ricotta, parmesan and romano cheese.** Please allow 2 hours when ordering this house specialty. **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage.

items.title: Lasagna Classico (Serves up to 12)
items.description: An Olive Garden Favorite. Available Freshly-Baked or Bake-At-Home. Add an extra dozen or half dozen breadsticks to your online order Click here for at home Breadsticks Baking Instructions

items.title: Chicken Scampi (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of bell peppers and red onions sautéed with chicken tenderloins in a creamy scampi sauce. Served over angel hair pasta.

items.title: Chicken and Shrimp Carbonara (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of sautéed seasoned chicken, shrimp and spaghetti tossed in a creamy sauce with bacon and roasted red peppers.

items.title: Shrimp Scampi (Serves 4 - 6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of shrimp sautéed in a garlic sauce, tossed with asparagus, tomatoes, and angel hair pasta.

items.title: Cheese Ravioli with Marinara (Serves 4-6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of cheese-filled ravioli topped with marinara sauce and melted Italian cheeses.

items.title: Cheese Ravioli with Meat Sauce** (Serves 4-6)
items.description: Includes: A pan of cheese-filled ravioli topped with meat sauce** and melted Italian cheeses. **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage.

items.title: Homemade Soups Large (Serves 12)
items.description: Try any one of our four soups made from scratch! Chicken & Gnocchi: A creamy soup made with roasted chicken, traditional Italian dumplings and spinach. Pasta e Fagioli: White and red beans, ground beef, tomatoes and pasta in a savory broth. Minestrone (V): Fresh vegetables, beans and pasta in a light tomato broth - a vegetarian classic. Zuppa Toscana: Spicy sausage, fresh kale and russet potatoes in a creamy broth.

items.title: Homemade Soups (Serves 6)
items.description: Try any one of our four soups made from scratch! Chicken & Gnocchi: A creamy soup made with roasted chicken, traditional Italian dumplings and spinach. Pasta e Fagioli: White and red beans, ground beef, tomatoes and pasta in a savory broth. Minestrone (V): Fresh vegetables, beans and pasta in a light tomato broth - a vegetarian classic. Zuppa Toscana: Spicy sausage, fresh kale and russet potatoes in a creamy broth.

items.title: Lasagna Classico
items.description: Prepared fresh daily with layers of pasta, Italian cheeses and our homemade meat sauce.** **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage. Available Monday-Friday, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.description: A classic with our homemade marinara and a side of spaghetti. Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Fettuccine Alfredo (V)
items.description: Our sauce is made fresh daily with ingredients like parmesan, fresh cream and garlic. Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Shrimp Scampi
items.description: Shrimp sautéed in a garlic sauce, tossed with asparagus, tomatoes, and angel hair pasta. Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Spaghetti
items.description: Spaghetti topped with your choice of homemade marinara (V) or meat sauce prepared fresh daily.** **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage. Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Eggplant Parmigiana (V)
items.description: Spaghetti topped with your choice of homemade marinara (V) or meat sauce prepared fresh daily.** **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage. Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Spaghetti & Meatballs
items.description: Enjoy Spaghetti and Meatballs with meat sauce or marinara. Our sauces are prepared fresh daily with garlic and herbs. Served with two meatballs.** **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Cheese Ravioli
items.description: Filled with a blend of indulgent Italian cheeses, topped with your choice of homemade marinara or meat sauce** and melted mozzarella. **Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage. Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Five Cheese Ziti al Forno
items.description: A baked blend of Italian cheeses, pasta and our signature five cheese marinara. Available weekdays, 11am-3pm. Excluding Holidays.

items.title: Soup, Salad and Breadsticks
items.description: Our famous house salad, choice of homemade soup and warm garlic breadsticks. Available Monday through Friday, 11am-3:00pm. For ordering outside the weekday lunch period (Monday-Friday 11am -3:00pm), browse the Soups, Salad and Breadsticks section.

items.title: Chocolate Lasagna (V)
items.description: Decadent layers of chocolate cake, creamy chocolate mousse, and a delicate layer of crushed wafers. Topped with chocolate sauce.

items.description: The classic Italian dessert. A layer of creamy custard set atop espresso-soaked ladyfingers.

items.description: Vanilla sponge cake layered with sweet vanilla cream and topped with fresh strawberries.

items.description: Spicy Italian sausage, fresh kale and russet potatoes in a creamy broth. Breadsticks not included to accommodate dietary needs. Available upon request.
